channel.title: [PI] Making NPC's nonvisible on condition
channel.description: ok, so i just made this quest and i was wondering if there was a way to make it so if they have reached a certain point in the quest, i can make the Npc's disapear, cuz they arent needed anymore. i can make it so they wont talk to the people anymore, but tht contradicts the story line. so please any help is much appreciated (possibly rep'd)

item.title: [PI] Making NPC's nonvisible on condition

item.description:

ok, so i just made this quest and i was wondering if there was a way to make it so if they have reached a certain point in the quest, i can make the Npc’s disapear, cuz they arent needed anymore. i can make it so they wont talk to the people anymore, but tht contradicts the story line. so please any help is much appreciated (possibly rep’d)
